Package com.project.alertapp.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.project.alertapp.services.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
UserService provides receive, update and delete users.
Author:
KaanSarigul

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      This method retrieves all users from database.
      Returns:
      Returns list of all users.

    • saveOneUser

      public User saveOneUser​(User newUser)
      This method provides to create a new user.
      Parameters:
      newUser - It contains user details.The details cannot be null.
      Returns:
      Returns saved user.

    • getOneUser

      public User getOneUser​(Long userId)
      This method retrieve a user using by user Id.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      Returns:
      Returns a user using userId.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser​(Long userId)
      This method delete a user completely.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.

    • softDeleteUser

      public User softDeleteUser​(Long userId, SoftDeleteRequest deleteRequest)
      This method changes deleted property of the user. It means soft delete a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      deleteRequest - It contains deleted property which will change alert's deleted property.
      Returns:
      Returns updated user.

    • loginUser

      public User loginUser​(LoginRequest loginRequest)
      This method provides the user to login using their tcNo and password.
      Parameters:
      loginRequest - Contains tcNo and password both of them cannot be null.
      Returns:
      Returns logged in user.

    • updateUser

      public User updateUser​(Long userId, UpdateUserRequest updateUser)
      This method changes user properties using by updateUserRequest object.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      updateUser - UpdateUser object contains new user properties.
      Returns:
      Returns updated User.

    • updatePassword

      public User updatePassword​(Long userId, UpdatePasswordRequest updatePasswordRequest)
      This method changes user password using by updateAlertRequest object.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      updatePasswordRequest - UpdatePasswordRequest object contains new user password.
      Returns:
      Returns updated user.
